--- layout: apidoc title: Tile5 API Documentation ---

T5.Pos

Methods

distanceTo(targetPos)

equalTo(testPos)

empty()

inArray(testArray)

offset(latOffset, lonOffset)

Return a new position which is the original pos offset by the specified latOffset and lonOffset (which are specified in km distance)

toPixels()

Return an xy of the mercator pixel value for the position

toString()
